analysis.headline: Your External Site Tracking
analysis.quote: Keep in mind that when you visit other websites... the privacy policies and practices of those other websites apply... we can’t completely protect you when you visit other websites and apps.

analysis.headline: Your IP Address Visibility
analysis.quote: we cannot prevent your device's IP address from being seen by your internet service provider, our hosting provider, or other internet providers in between

analysis.headline: Your Ad Click Privacy
analysis.quote: Ad clicks are managed by Microsoft's ad network and Microsoft has committed to not associate your ad-click behavior with a user profile and to not store or share that information other than for accounting purposes.

analysis.headline: Your Optional Feature PII
analysis.quote: We offer optional privacy-protecting features that require limited personal information to function... For example, our Email Protection is an optional feature that requires some personal information to work (namely, your email address)

analysis.headline: Your Direct Communication Sharing
analysis.quote: your communication may be accessible to the software-as-a-service providers we use in our corporate systems (such as our company email and project management software).

analysis.headline: Your Cross-Border Data
analysis.quote: there are scenarios where we may transfer this limited personal information (for example, your email address) to countries other than the country in which it was received.

analysis.headline: Your Data Legal Requests
analysis.quote: we will vigorously resist government efforts to compel us to produce the very limited personal information that we might have, for example, your email address if you subscribe to our newsletter.

analysis.headline: Your Data Not Sold
analysis.quote: We do not sell your personal information. We have never sold any personal information. Period.

analysis.headline: Your Children's Data
analysis.quote: We do not knowingly market to or solicit information from children under 13.

analysis.headline: Your Passive Policy Updates
analysis.quote: We will notify you of changes by posting the modified version on our website.
